1""" 

2HyperCode Community Idea Generator - Web Interface (HTML/CSS/JS) 

3 

4A beautiful, accessible interface for community to explore and vote on ideas. 

5Fully responsive, neurodivergent-friendly design. 

6""" 

7 

8HTML = """ 

9<!DOCTYPE html> 

10<html lang="en"> 

11<head> 

12 <meta charset="UTF-8"> 

13 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> 

14 <title>HyperCode Idea Generator - Shape the Future</title> 

15 <style> 

16 * { 

17 margin: 0; 

18 padding: 0; 

19 box-sizing: border-box; 

20 } 

21 

22 body { 

23 font-family: 'Arial', 'Helvetica', sans-serif; 

24 background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); 

25 min-height: 100vh; 

26 padding: 20px; 

27 letter-spacing: 0.5px; 

28 line-height: 1.6; 

29 } 

30 

31 .container { 

32 max-width: 1200px; 

33 margin: 0 auto; 

34 } 

35 

36 /* Header */ 

37 header { 

38 text-align: center; 

39 color: white; 

40 margin-bottom: 40px; 

41 } 

42 

43 header h1 { 

44 font-size: 2.5rem; 

45 margin-bottom: 10px; 

46 text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); 

47 } 

48 

49 header p { 

50 font-size: 1.2rem; 

51 opacity: 0.9; 

52 } 

53 

54 /* Category Selector */ 

55 .selector { 

56 display: grid; 

57 grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); 

58 gap: 15px; 

59 margin-bottom: 40px; 

60 } 

61 

62 .selector-group { 

63 background: white; 

64 padding: 20px; 

65 border-radius: 10px; 

66 box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); 

67 } 

68 

69 .selector-group label { 

70 display: block; 

71 font-weight: bold; 

72 margin-bottom: 10px; 

73 color: #333; 

74 } 

75 

76 .selector-group select { 

77 width: 100%; 

78 padding: 10px; 

79 border: 2px solid #667eea; 

80 border-radius: 5px; 

81 font-size: 1rem; 

82 cursor: pointer; 

83 background-color: #f9f9f9; 

84 } 

85 

86 /* Ideas Grid */ 

87 .ideas-grid { 

88 display: grid; 

89 grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr)); 

90 gap: 20px; 

91 margin-bottom: 40px; 

92 } 

93 

94 .idea-card { 

95 background: white; 

96 border-radius: 10px; 

97 padding: 25px; 

98 box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); 

99 transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s; 

100 border-left: 5px solid #667eea; 

101 } 

102 

103 .idea-card:hover { 

104 transform: translateY(-5px); 

105 box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); 

106 } 

107 

108 .idea-card.high-impact { 

109 border-left-color: #ff6b6b; 

110 } 

111 

112 .idea-card.medium-impact { 

113 border-left-color: #ffa500; 

114 } 

115 

116 .idea-card.low-impact { 

117 border-left-color: #4ecdc4; 

118 } 

119 

120 .idea-title { 

121 font-size: 1.3rem; 

122 font-weight: bold; 

123 color: #333; 

124 margin-bottom: 10px; 

125 } 

126 

127 .idea-description { 

128 color: #666; 

129 margin-bottom: 15px; 

130 font-size: 0.95rem; 

131 } 

132 

133 .idea-meta { 

134 display: flex; 

135 flex-wrap: wrap; 

136 gap: 10px; 

137 margin-bottom: 15px; 

138 font-size: 0.9rem; 

139 } 

140 

141 .meta-tag { 

142 background: #f0f0f0; 

143 padding: 5px 10px; 

144 border-radius: 20px; 

145 color: #666; 

146 } 

147 

148 .meta-tag.impact { 

149 background: #ffe5e5; 

150 color: #c92a2a; 

151 } 

152 

153 .meta-tag.effort { 

154 background: #e5f4ff; 

155 color: #0066cc; 

156 } 

157 

158 .meta-tag.community { 

159 background: #f0e5ff; 

160 color: #7c3aed; 

161 } 

162 

163 .vote-section { 

164 display: flex; 

165 align-items: center; 

166 gap: 10px; 

167 margin-top: 15px; 

168 padding-top: 15px; 

169 border-top: 1px solid #eee; 

170 } 

171 

172 .vote-button { 

173 background: #667eea; 

174 color: white; 

175 border: none; 

176 padding: 10px 20px; 

177 border-radius: 5px; 

178 cursor: pointer; 

179 font-weight: bold; 

180 transition: background 0.3s; 

181 } 

182 

183 .vote-button:hover { 

184 background: #764ba2; 

185 } 

186 

187 .vote-count { 

188 font-weight: bold; 

189 color: #667eea; 

190 font-size: 1.1rem; 

191 } 

192 

193 /* Loading State */ 

194 .loading { 

195 text-align: center; 

196 color: white; 

197 font-size: 1.2rem; 

198 } 

199 

200 /* Stats Bar */ 

201 .stats-bar { 

202 background: white; 

203 padding: 20px; 

204 border-radius: 10px; 

205 display: grid; 

206 grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr)); 

207 gap: 20px; 

208 margin-bottom: 30px; 

209 box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); 

210 } 

211 

212 .stat { 

213 text-align: center; 

214 } 

215 

216 .stat-number { 

217 font-size: 2rem; 

218 font-weight: bold; 

219 color: #667eea; 

220 } 

221 

222 .stat-label { 

223 color: #666; 

224 font-size: 0.9rem; 

225 margin-top: 5px; 

226 } 

227 

228 /* Footer */ 

229 footer { 

230 text-align: center; 

231 color: white; 

232 margin-top: 50px; 

233 padding-top: 30px; 

234 border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3); 

235 } 

236 

237 /* Accessibility */ 

238 @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) { 

239 * { 

240 transition: none !important; 

241 animation: none !important; 

242 } 

243 } 

244 

245 @media (max-width: 768px) { 

246 header h1 { 

247 font-size: 1.8rem; 

248 } 

249 

250 .selector { 

251 grid-template-columns: 1fr; 

252 } 

253 

254 .ideas-grid { 

255 grid-template-columns: 1fr; 

256 } 

257 

258 .stats-bar { 

259 grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); 

260 } 

261 } 

262 

263 /* Focus visible for accessibility */ 

264 button:focus-visible, 

265 select:focus-visible { 

266 outline: 3px solid #ffd700; 

267 outline-offset: 2px; 

268 } 

269 

270 /* Dark mode support */ 

271 @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) { 

272 body { 

273 background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a2e 0%, #16213e 100%); 

274 } 

275 

276 .idea-card, 

277 .selector-group, 

278 .stats-bar { 

279 background: #2d2d44; 

280 color: #e0e0e0; 

281 } 

282 

283 .idea-title { 

284 color: #ffffff; 

285 } 

286 

287 .idea-description { 

288 color: #b0b0b0; 

289 } 

290 

291 .meta-tag { 

292 background: #404050; 

293 color: #d0d0d0; 

294 } 

295 } 

296 </style> 

297</head> 

298<body> 

299 <div class="container"> 

300 <header> 

301 <h1>🚀 HyperCode Idea Generator</h1> 

302 <p>Shape the future of programming for neurodivergent developers</p> 

303 </header> 

304 

305 <div class="stats-bar"> 

306 <div class="stat"> 

307 <div class="stat-number" id="total-ideas">32</div> 

308 <div class="stat-label">Ideas Proposed</div> 

309 </div> 

310 <div class="stat"> 

311 <div class="stat-number" id="total-votes">0</div> 

312 <div class="stat-label">Community Votes</div> 

313 </div> 

314 <div class="stat"> 

315 <div class="stat-number" id="trending">-</div> 

316 <div class="stat-label">Trending Now</div> 

317 </div> 

318 </div> 

319 

320 <div class="selector"> 

321 <div class="selector-group"> 

322 <label for="category">📚 Category</label> 

323 <select id="category"> 

324 <option value="">-- Select Category --</option> 

325 <option value="language_design">🔤 Language Design</option> 

326 <option value="features_tooling">🛠️ Features & Tooling</option> 

327 <option value="community">🤝 Community</option> 

328 <option value="accessibility">♿ Accessibility</option> 

329 </select> 

330 </div> 

331 

332 <div class="selector-group"> 

333 <label for="difficulty">⚡ Difficulty Level</label> 

334 <select id="difficulty"> 

335 <option value="">-- All Levels --</option> 

336 <option value="beginner">Beginner (Low effort)</option> 

337 <option value="intermediate">Intermediate</option> 

338 <option value="advanced">Advanced (High impact)</option> 

339 </select> 

340 </div> 

341 

342 <div class="selector-group"> 

343 <label for="sort">📊 Sort By</label> 

344 <select id="sort"> 

345 <option value="votes">Most Voted</option> 

346 <option value="impact">Highest Impact</option> 

347 <option value="effort">Lowest Effort</option> 

348 </select> 

349 </div> 

350 </div> 

351 

352 <div id="ideas-container" class="ideas-grid"> 

353 <div class="loading">Loading ideas...</div> 

354 </div> 

355 

356 <footer> 

357 <p>💓 Built for the HyperCode movement | Powered by AI-powered recommendations</p> 

358 <p>All ideas are community-driven. Vote for your favorites!</p> 

359 </footer> 

360 </div> 

361 

362 <script> 

363 // Simulated ideas data (would come from backend API) 

364 const ideas = [ 

365 { 

366 id: 'ld_001', 

367 category: 'language_design', 

368 difficulty: 'beginner', 

369 title: '3D Spatial Mode Extension', 

370 description: 'Extend @ (2D mode) to support Z-axis for 3D spatial thinking.', 

371 impact: 'High', 

372 effort: 'Medium', 

373 community: 'Visual learners', 

374 votes: 0 

375 }, 

376 // ... more ideas would be populated here 

377 ]; 

378 

379 // UI Functions 

380 function renderIdeas() { 

381 const container = document.getElementById('ideas-container'); 

382 const category = document.getElementById('category').value; 

383 const difficulty = document.getElementById('difficulty').value; 

384 

385 let filtered = ideas; 

386 

387 if (category) { 

388 filtered = filtered.filter(i => i.category === category); 

389 } 

390 

391 if (difficulty) { 

392 filtered = filtered.filter(i => i.difficulty === difficulty); 

393 } 

394 

395 if (filtered.length === 0) { 

396 container.innerHTML = '<div class="loading">No ideas found. Try different filters!</div>'; 

397 return; 

398 } 

399 

400 container.innerHTML = filtered.map(idea => ` 

401 <div class="idea-card ${idea.impact.toLowerCase()}-impact"> 

402 <div class="idea-title">${idea.title}</div> 

403 <div class="idea-description">${idea.description}</div> 

404 <div class="idea-meta"> 

405 <span class="meta-tag impact">Impact: ${idea.impact}</span> 

406 <span class="meta-tag effort">Effort: ${idea.effort}</span> 

407 <span class="meta-tag community">${idea.community}</span> 

408 </div> 

409 <div class="vote-section"> 

410 <button class="vote-button" onclick="vote('${idea.id}')">👍 Vote</button> 

411 <span class="vote-count">${idea.votes}</span> 

412 </div> 

413 </div> 

414 `).join(''); 

415 } 

416 

417 function vote(id) { 

418 const idea = ideas.find(i => i.id === id); 

419 if (idea) { 

420 idea.votes++; 

421 renderIdeas(); 

422 updateStats(); 

423 } 

424 } 

425 

426 function updateStats() { 

427 const totalVotes = ideas.reduce((sum, i) => sum + i.votes, 0); 

428 document.getElementById('total-votes').textContent = totalVotes; 

429 } 

430 

431 // Event Listeners 

432 document.getElementById('category').addEventListener('change', renderIdeas); 

433 document.getElementById('difficulty').addEventListener('change', renderIdeas); 

434 document.getElementById('sort').addEventListener('change', renderIdeas); 

435 

436 // Initial render 

437 renderIdeas(); 

438 updateStats(); 

439 </script> 

440</body> 

441</html> 

442""" 

443 

444# Write to file 

445if __name__ == "__main__": 

446 with open("hypercode-idea-generator.html", "w") as f: 

447 f.write(HTML) 

448 print("✅ Created hypercode-idea-generator.html") 

449 print("📱 Open in browser to see the interactive idea generator!") 

« prev     ^ index     » next       coverage.py v7.11.3, created at 2025-12-04 11:42 +0000
